title: AsyncIO.DotNet
description:
Easy-to-use library for common async IO file system operations. Implemented operations are fully asynchronous and do not use threads from thread pool.
AsyncIO provides decent control over async execution (e.g. support of CancellationToken) and provides API for specifying encoding.

packOptions.summary: Easy-to-use library for common asynchronous file system operations.
packOptions.releaseNotes:
Add .NET Core support.
Add xml documentation for all implemented operations.
